languages.text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, his face wearing a strange, unfamiliar expression, a mixture of the expected blood-soaked madness of a Drukhari and something akin to... rapturous astonishment? He looks at you as if he has just been granted some kind of revelation.{/n} "{name}... come. I cannot wait for us to share our greatest feast yet."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай поворачивается к вам. В его лице — некое неведомое, совершенно незнакомое вам выражение, в котором смешаны привычное вам кровавое безумие ксеноса и нечто, напоминающее... восторженное изумление? Друкари смотрит на вас так, словно на него снизошло откровение.{/n} "{name}... идем же. Мне не терпится разделить с тобой наше величайшее пиршество".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, his face wearing a strange, unfamiliar expression, a mixture of the expected blood-soaked madness of a Drukhari and something akin to... rapturous astonishment? He looks at you as if he has just been granted some kind of revelation.{/n} "{name}... come. I cannot wait for us to share our greatest feast yet."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Маражай поворачивается к вам. В его лице — некое неведомое, совершенно незнакомое вам выражение, в котором смешаны привычное вам кровавое безумие ксеноса и нечто, напоминающее... восторженное изумление? Друкари смотрит на вас так, словно на него снизошло откровение.{/n} "{name}... идем же. Мне не терпится разделить с тобой наше величайшее пиршество".
{n}玛拉斋转向你，脸上带着某种你从未见过的奇异表情，其中既混杂着你早已熟悉的黑暗灵族的嗜血疯狂，也混杂着某种……充满狂喜的震惊？他以仿佛得到启示的目光望着你。{/n}“{name}……来吧，我迫不及待想与你共赴这场最伟大的盛宴。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, his face wearing a strange, unfamiliar expression, a mixture of the expected blood-soaked madness of a Drukhari and something akin to... rapturous astonishment? He looks at you as if he has just been granted some kind of revelation.{/n} "{name}... come. I cannot wait for us to share our greatest feast yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋转向你，脸上带着某种你从未见过的奇异表情，其中既混杂着你早已熟悉的黑暗灵族的嗜血疯狂，也混杂着某种……充满狂喜的震惊？他以仿佛得到启示的目光望着你。{/n}“{name}……来吧，我迫不及待想与你共赴这场最伟大的盛宴。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se gira hacia ti; en su rostro hay una expresión que no le habías visto antes, una mezcla de la consabida sed de sangre de los drukhari y algo que se parece a... ¿sorpresa y euforia? Te mira como si le acabases de revelar algún tipo de verdad trascendental.{/n} «{name}... ven conmigo. Ardo en deseos de compartir contigo el mayor de todos los festines que nos hemos dado».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, his face wearing a strange, unfamiliar expression, a mixture of the expected blood-soaked madness of a Drukhari and something akin to... rapturous astonishment? He looks at you as if he has just been granted some kind of revelation.{/n} "{name}... come. I cannot wait for us to share our greatest feast yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se gira hacia ti; en su rostro hay una expresión que no le habías visto antes, una mezcla de la consabida sed de sangre de los drukhari y algo que se parece a... ¿sorpresa y euforia? Te mira como si le acabases de revelar algún tipo de verdad trascendental.{/n} «{name}... ven conmigo. Ardo en deseos de compartir contigo el mayor de todos los festines que nos hemos dado».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se tourne vers vous, affichant une expression étrange. Vous y lisez sans surprise la folie meurtrière drukhari, attisée par la vue du sang, mais également quelque chose évoquant... un étonnement jouissif ? Il vous dévisage comme s'il venait d'avoir une révélation.{/n} « Venez, {name}. Je suis impatient de partager cet immense festin avec vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, his face wearing a strange, unfamiliar expression, a mixture of the expected blood-soaked madness of a Drukhari and something akin to... rapturous astonishment? He looks at you as if he has just been granted some kind of revelation.{/n} "{name}... come. I cannot wait for us to share our greatest feast yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se tourne vers vous, affichant une expression étrange. Vous y lisez sans surprise la folie meurtrière drukhari, attisée par la vue du sang, mais également quelque chose évoquant... un étonnement jouissif ? Il vous dévisage comme s'il venait d'avoir une révélation.{/n} « Venez, {name}. Je suis impatient de partager cet immense festin avec vous. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wendet sich dir zu und ein merkwürdiger, ungewohnter Ausdruck huscht über sein Gesicht. Es ist eine Mischung aus dem erwartbaren blutgetränkten Wahnsinn eines Drukhari und ... entzücktem Erstaunen? Er blickt dich an, als hätte er gerade eine Art Offenbarung erfahren.{/n} "{name} ... kommt. Ich kann es nicht erwarten, dass wir unser bisher größtes Fest miteinander teilen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, his face wearing a strange, unfamiliar expression, a mixture of the expected blood-soaked madness of a Drukhari and something akin to... rapturous astonishment? He looks at you as if he has just been granted some kind of revelation.{/n} "{name}... come. I cannot wait for us to share our greatest feast yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai wendet sich dir zu und ein merkwürdiger, ungewohnter Ausdruck huscht über sein Gesicht. Es ist eine Mischung aus dem erwartbaren blutgetränkten Wahnsinn eines Drukhari und ... entzücktem Erstaunen? Er blickt dich an, als hätte er gerade eine Art Offenbarung erfahren.{/n} "{name} ... kommt. Ich kann es nicht erwarten, dass wir unser bisher größtes Fest miteinander teilen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイがあなたに向き直る。その顔は、奇妙な見慣れない表情を浮かべていた。デュカーリの血に塗れた狂気と…どこか、歓喜と驚嘆が入り混じったような顔だった。まるで啓示を受けたかのように、彼はあなたを見る。{/n}「{name}…来いよ。最高の宴を二人でわかち合うこの時が待ち遠しかったんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, his face wearing a strange, unfamiliar expression, a mixture of the expected blood-soaked madness of a Drukhari and something akin to... rapturous astonishment? He looks at you as if he has just been granted some kind of revelation.{/n} "{name}... come. I cannot wait for us to share our greatest feast yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイがあなたに向き直る。その顔は、奇妙な見慣れない表情を浮かべていた。デュカーリの血に塗れた狂気と…どこか、歓喜と驚嘆が入り混じったような顔だった。まるで啓示を受けたかのように、彼はあなたを見る。{/n}「{name}…来いよ。最高の宴を二人でわかち合うこの時が待ち遠しかったんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana dönüyor. Yüzüne aşina olmadığın, tuhaf bir ifade hâkim. Bir Drukhari'den beklenen kana bulanmış çılgınlık ile... Coşkuyla bezenmiş şaşkınlığı andıran bir ifade, âdeta birbirine karışmış. Kendisine bir tür aydınlanma bahşedilmişçesine sana bakıyor.{/n} "{name}... Gel. En lezzetli ziyafetimizi paylaşmak için sabırsızlanıyorum."
